</graphic><zone type="main" xmlns:mith="http://mith.umd.edu/sc/ns1#"><lb n="c57-0154_main_1"/>hension of the murderer<unclear>.</unclear><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154_main_2"/>The magistrate listened <del rend="strikethrough">to</del> to me with at<lb n="c57-0154_main_3"/><add place="intralinear">ten</add>tion& kindness – Be assured, sir, said he no pains <lb n="c57-0154_main_4"/>or exertions on my part <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough">sha</del> have been or <lb n="c57-0154_main_5"/>shall be spared to discover the <del rend="strikethrough">wretch</del><add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear">villain</add><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154_main_6"/>I thank you, <add place="intralinear">I</add> replied, listen therefore to <lb n="c57-0154_main_7"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0154.01"/><zone corresp="#c57-0154.01" type="left_margin"><lb n="c57-0154_c57-0154.01_1"/><add>the </add></zone><del rend="strikethrough">tale</del><add place="superlinear">deposition</add> I have to <del rend="strikethrough">relate</del><add place="superlinear">make</add>. <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough">which</del> It is a indeed a <lb n="c57-0154_main_8"/>tale so <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough">wonderf</del> strange that I fear you would <lb n="c57-0154_main_9"/>not credit it were there not somthing in <lb n="c57-0154_main_10"/>truth which however wonderful forces <lb n="c57-0154_main_11"/>conviction. The story is <add place="superlinear">too</add> connected to be mis<lb n="c57-0154_main_12"/>taken for a dream & I have no motive <lb n="c57-0154_main_13"/>for falsehood. My manner as I said this <lb n="c57-0154_main_14"/><del instant="true" rend="strikethrough">wals</del> was impressive but calm; I had formed <lb n="c57-0154_main_15"/>in my own heart the resolution to pursue <lb n="c57-0154_main_16"/>my destroyer to death & this purpose quieted <lb n="c57-0154_main_17"/>my agony &<add place="sublinear"><metamark function="insert">^</metamark></add><add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear">provisionally</add> reconciled me to life. I now <lb n="c57-0154_main_18"/>related my history briefly but with firmness <lb n="c57-0154_main_19"/>& precision – marking dates with accuracy <lb n="c57-0154_main_20"/>and never deviating into invective or <lb n="c57-0154_main_21"/>exclamation. The magistrate appeared at <lb n="c57-0154_main_22"/>first perfectly incredulous but as I con<lb n="c57-0154_main_23"/>tinued he became <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough">be</del> more atte<add place="intralinear">nt</add>ive &<lb n="c57-0154_main_24"/>interrested –I saw him sometimes shudder <lb n="c57-0154_main_25"/>with horror, at others a lively surprise <lb n="c57-0154_main_26"/>unmi<del rend="strikethrough">xed</del><add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear">ngled</add> with disbelief was painted <lb n="c57-0154_main_27"/>on his countenance. When I had concluded <lb n="c57-0154_main_28"/>my <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough">relation I</del> narration I said.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154_main_29"/>This is the being whom I accuse <lb n="c57-0154_main_30"/>and for whose detection & punishment <lb n="c57-0154_main_31"/>I call upon you <add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear">to</add> exert your whole power <lb n="c57-0154_main_32"/><add place="intralinear">It</add> is your duty as a magist<add place="sublinear"><metamark function="insert">^</metamark></add><add place="superlinear">r</add>ate and <lb n="c57-0154_main_33"/>I believe & hope your feelings as a man <lb n="c57-0154_main_34"/>do not revol<add place="intralinear">t</add> from the execution <lb n="c57-0154_main_35"/>of <del rend="strikethrough">your</del><add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear">those</add> functions on this occasion.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154_main_36"/>This
